newsitem.title: USA: US Home Builders-Market Index flat at 57 in July.
newsitem.headline: US Home Builders-Market Index flat at 57 in July.

text.p: The National Association of Home Builders (NAHB) said its Housing Market Index was unchanged at 57 in July.
Builders' ratings of single-family home sales was unchanged at 61, NAHB said.
Meanwhile, traffic of prospective buyers rose to 46 in July from 44 in June. And the component index for single-family sales in the next six months rose to 68 from 66 during the same period.
